abstract: Letter written by Fidel Castro, published in nation's Communist Party newspaper Granma, supports peaceful end to conflict between Cuba and the United States, but he says he still does not trust the US; some American officials question authorship of letter, since it seems to serve Pres Raul Castro's interests.
lead_paragraph: In a letter, Mr. Castro wrote that he did not trust the politics of the United States, but added that this was not “a rejection of a peaceful solution to conflicts.”
snippet: In a letter, Mr. Castro wrote that he did not trust the politics of the United States, but added that this was not “a rejection of a peaceful solution to conflicts.”

headline.main: Fidel Castro Shares Views on Warming of Relations
headline.print_headline: Fidel Castro Still Cautious on Relations With U.S.
